Articles.Content:
I want to know if there is a mod for 1.0X to allow for a plume around the engine? I know about realism overhaul, but I have an un-RO version (1.04) and would like to know if there is a plume mod for it.

Thank you.

Try This: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/121987-1-0-2-Engine-Lighting-(1-3-5)-The-IVA-Update-(16-June)

This may also help: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/65754-HotRockets!-Particle-FX-Replacement-Tutorial

Edited June 27, 2015 by Whizzkid
